short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change that youtube's bar to bring the full red back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I (personally) don't like the new youtube's new bar (and it's so disturbing for me) so, I decided to create a Script to bring back that red bar again!

Lastest updates :
V1.4 : Fixed : The Youtube Shorts Progress bar (Thanks to the user for reporting it to me)
V1.3 : The script now changes the color of "Shorts" bar, fully changes the progress bar under the video recommendations and the top bar above Youtube

Source code :
https://github.com/ChefUiChef/Youtube-Old-Red-Bar
